item.title: Python Post
item.description: In order to use python in RStudio you have to install the reticulate package and start a code chunk using “{python}.” After ensuring that you have python installed on the computer, it’s simple to start coding python within RStudio. R can be used within the same markdown document by starting another chunk and using “{R}.” By importing the package re in python, it’s possible to use regular expressions to identify patterns using re.
